metadata.title: CVE-2023-20860 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Spring Framework running version 6.0.0 - 6.0.6 or 5.3.0 - 5.3.25 using "**"as a pattern in Spring Security configuration with the mvcRequestMatchercreates a mismatch in pattern matching between Spring Security and SpringMVC, and the potential for a security bypass.

criterions.comment: libspring-java package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
